title: Entrepreneurship Education Instructional Design Based on Economics of Care: Social Value Creation Program in Science for Prospective Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education knowledge, problem-identification skills in educational settings
context.additional_context: A blended course operating in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment, designed for pre-service teachers to develop entrepreneurial skills incorporating social consideration concepts in science education

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply care economics principles to science education startup ideas.
Learners can design collaborative education startup models to address community issues.
Learners can refine science education programs that generate social value by incorporating prototype evaluation feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
